item.description:
SEAL member and liberty activist Laura Jones and her son Kyle are running for two of the state representative seats in Rochester this year. You can find out more about Laura and Kyle at http://jones4staterep....

If you would like to support Laura and Kyle's candidacy, they are in need of volunteers for a literature drop.

From Laura:
"Saturday, July 3rd, at 9 a.m., meet at 9 Jackson Street, Rochester, NH 03867, for coffee and donuts. We'll pair up drivers and runners and drop lit. until noon. Then meet back at our house for pizza and conversation. Lots of fun and good exercise too! "
item.name: Lit Drop For Laura and Kyle Jones
